instruction: Generate a sample of a business email.
output:
Dear [Recipient],

I hope you are doing well, and staying safe during this time. I wanted to follow up with you regarding our [discussion/meeting] on [date]. As we discussed in our [meeting/discussion], I am looking to [action]. I wanted to check if there has been any progress on that, and if there is anything else I can do to support it. 

Thanks,
[Name]
